about_the_game:
Doctor Who: The Edge of Reality - Deluxe Edition includes the full game and exclusive bonus content!



No journey through space and time is complete without your trusty Sonic Screwdriver, and now you can equip yourself with all of your favourite designs!

  • Ninth Doctor's Sonic Screwdriver
  • Tenth Doctor's Sonic Screwdriver (plus Time Lord Victorious variant)
  • Eleventh Doctor's Sonic Screwdriver
  • Twelfth Doctor's Sonic Screwdriver

Choose between multiple gloves and solve the timey-wimey mystery in style!

  • Gallifreyan gloves
  • Black leather gloves
  • Cyberman gloves
  • River Song's gloves
detailed_description:
Wishlist Peaky Blinders: The King's Ransom Complete Edition


About the Game

Doctor Who: The Edge of Reality - Deluxe Edition includes the full game and exclusive bonus content!



No journey through space and time is complete without your trusty Sonic Screwdriver, and now you can equip yourself with all of your favourite designs!

  • Ninth Doctor's Sonic Screwdriver
  • Tenth Doctor's Sonic Screwdriver (plus Time Lord Victorious variant)
  • Eleventh Doctor's Sonic Screwdriver
  • Twelfth Doctor's Sonic Screwdriver

Choose between multiple gloves and solve the timey-wimey mystery in style!

short_description: Doctor Who: The Edge of Reality - Deluxe Edition includes exclusive bonus content. Equip yourself with your favourite Sonic Screwdrivers and switch it up with multiple glove designs to solve the timey-wimey mystery in true Doctor Who style!
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Italian, Japanese, Korean
*languages with full audio support
